DTP1: 1st dose of diphtheria toxoid, tetanus toxoid and pertussis vaccine
DTP3: 3rd dose of diphtheria toxoid, tetanus toxoid and pertussis vaccine
HepB_BD: Hepatitis B birth dose 24 hours after birth
Hib3: Third dose of Haemophilus influenzae type B vaccine
IPV1: First dose of inactivated Polio containing vaccine
MCV2: Second dose of measles containing vaccine
PCV3: Third dose of pneumococcal conjugate vaccine
RCV1: First dose of Rubella containing vaccine
